title: Goldie Hawn and Amy Schumer Are Already Winning the Golden Globes -- See Their Hilarious Pre-Show Prep!
text: Goldie Hawn and Amy Schumer Are Already Winning the Golden Globes -- See Their Hilarious Pre-Show Prep! by Chris Azzopardi 4:47   Getty Images We couldn't be more ready for that Goldie Hawn and Amy Schumer mother-daughter comedy! Hawn, who is presenting Best Film Comedy/Musical Actor with Schumer at tonight's Golden Globes, will star alongside Schumer in her first big-screen role in 14 years, the action-comedy Snatched , out May 12. WATCH: Golden Globes 2017 Cheat Sheet: Everything You Need to Know! And here's one more reason why this soon-to-be mom-daughter duo is currently a highlight of our lives: The actresses' latest Instagram posts, featuring both Hawn, 71, and Schumer, 35, as they prep for the Golden Globes in their own uniquely fabulous way. Sprawled out in a chair, Hawn appears to be in a state of pre-Globes euphoria as she luxuriates in a white bathrobe while her obviously-amused glam squad gets the veteran actress fancied up for the evening. "Super pumped for the Golden Globes," Hawn wrote, concluding the post with a festive dancing-lady emoji. Live it up, lady! A photo posted by Goldie Hawn (@officialgoldiehawn) on Jan 8, 2017 at 2:55pm PST Meanwhile, Schumer enjoyed a zen moment before getting glamorized for her co-presenting appearance with Hawn. "Getting ready is so harddsdddd!" she jokingly fussed. "I have to sit here and breathe #goldenglobes." A photo posted by @amyschumer on Jan 8, 2017 at 2:55pm PST The Globes will air live from the Beverly Hilton Hotel in Los Angeles at 8 p.m. ET / 5 p.m. PT on Sunday, Jan. 8 on NBC.
